#labels Phase-Deploy
How to upgrade version 1.0 to 1.0.1

Install the new software and then visit each of these pages in turn:

1. /repository/service/admin/changehost.xql
2. /repository/service/admin/migrate-db.xql
3. /repository/service/admin/update-security.html
4. /repository/service/admin/migrate-study-1.0-to-1.0.1.xql
5. /repository/service/admin/migrate-draft-1.0-to-1.0.1.xql
4. /repository/service/admin/migrate-study-info-1.0-to-1.0.1.xql
